languages.text: {n}Мир — непроглядный, полный теплой боли мрак. Вы недвижно лежите — нет, покоитесь! — в нем, постепенно растворяясь в ничто. Иногда ваш покой тревожит неприятная настойчивая дрожь, идущая из места, где когда-то были ваши ноги. Вы стараетесь игнорировать его.{/n}

{n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мир — непроглядный, полный теплой боли мрак. Вы недвижно лежите — нет, покоитесь! — в нем, постепенно растворяясь в ничто. Иногда ваш покой тревожит неприятная настойчивая дрожь, идущая из места, где когда-то были ваши ноги. Вы стараетесь игнорировать его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze full of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your feet once used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

{n}The world is an impenetrable haze full of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your feet once used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

{n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

{n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

{n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个世界仿佛变成了无法穿透的阴霾，充斥着温暖的痛苦。你一动不动地躺在里面——不，你这是在休息！你在黑暗之中休息，慢慢地融入虚无。偶尔，你感觉令人不快的颤抖从原本双腿该在的地方不断传来，干扰着你的休息，但你尽你所能地忽略这些干扰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个世界仿佛变成了无法穿透的阴霾，充斥着温暖的痛苦。你一动不动地躺在里面——不，你这是在休息！你在黑暗之中休息，慢慢地融入虚无。偶尔，你感觉令人不快的颤抖从原本双腿该在的地方不断传来，干扰着你的休息，但你尽你所能地忽略这些干扰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}生ぬるい痛みが延々と続く世界に放り込まれた気分だ。濁った暗闇の中を、まるで休んでいるかのように微動だにせず、徐々に無に帰していく。時々、脚があった場所が持続的に震えて不快な感覚に陥り、安静が妨げられることがある。その感覚をを無視しようと最善を尽くす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生ぬるい痛みが延々と続く世界に放り込まれた気分だ。濁った暗闇の中を、まるで休んでいるかのように微動だにせず、徐々に無に帰していく。時々、脚があった場所が持続的に震えて不快な感覚に陥り、安静が妨げられることがある。その感覚をを無視しようと最善を尽くす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mundo es una niebla impenetrable de dolor ardiente. Yaces inmóvil (¡no, descansas!) en la penumbra nebulosa, disolviéndote lentamente. En ocasiones, tu reposo se ve interrumpido por unos temblores desagradables y persistentes en la zona en la que antes estaban tus piernas. Haces todo lo que puedes por ignorarlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mundo es una niebla impenetrable de dolor ardiente. Yaces inmóvil (¡no, descansas!) en la penumbra nebulosa, disolviéndote lentamente. En ocasiones, tu reposo se ve interrumpido por unos temblores desagradables y persistentes en la zona en la que antes estaban tus piernas. Haces todo lo que puedes por ignorarlos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le monde n'est qu'un brouillard de souffrance impénétrable. Vous êtes inerte... non, vous vous reposez dans cette obscurité et c'est comme si le néant vous absorbait petit à petit. Parfois, des tremblements persistants et franchement désagréables viennent perturber votre repos, venant de l'endroit où se trouvaient vos jambes, mais vous vous efforcez de les ignorer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monde n'est qu'un brouillard de souffrance impénétrable. Vous êtes inerte... non, vous vous reposez dans cette obscurité et c'est comme si le néant vous absorbait petit à petit. Parfois, des tremblements persistants et franchement désagréables viennent perturber votre repos, venant de l'endroit où se trouvaient vos jambes, mais vous vous efforcez de les ignorer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Welt ist ein undurchdringlicher Dunst aus warmem Schmerz. Du liegst bewegungslos – nein, du ruhst! – im trüben Dunkeln und löst dich langsam zu nichts auf. Manchmal wird deine Ruhe durch ein unangenehmes und beständiges Zittern gestört, das von dem Ort kommt, wo vormals deine Beine waren. Du versuchst nach Möglichkeit, es zu ignorieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Welt ist ein undurchdringlicher Dunst aus warmem Schmerz. Du liegst bewegungslos – nein, du ruhst! – im trüben Dunkeln und löst dich langsam zu nichts auf. Manchmal wird deine Ruhe durch ein unangenehmes und beständiges Zittern gestört, das von dem Ort kommt, wo vormals deine Beine waren. Du versuchst nach Möglichkeit, es zu ignorieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dünya, acı bir sıcaklığın ardı arkası görünmeyen sisinden oluşuyor. Hareketsiz yatıyorsun. Hayır, dinleniyorsun! Kirli bir belirsizliğin içindesin ve çözülüp hiçliğe dönüşüyorsun. Bu huzur, eskiden bacağının olduğu yerden ara sıra gelen nahoş ve ısrarcı sarsıntılarla bozuluyor. Onları göz ardı etmek için elinden geleni yapıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world is an impenetrable haze of warm pain. You lie motionless — no, you rest! — in the murky gloom, slowly dissolving into nothingness. Sometimes your repose is troubled by unpleasant and persistent tremors coming from the place where your legs used to be. You do your best to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dünya, acı bir sıcaklığın, ardı arkası görünmeyen sisinden oluşuyor. Hareketsiz yatıyorsun. Hayır, dinleniyorsun! Kirli bir belirsizliğin içindesin ve çözülüp hiçliğe dönüşüyorsun. Bu huzur, eskiden bacağının olduğu yerden ara sıra gelen nahoş ve ısrarcı sarsıntılarla bozuluyor. Onları göz ardı etmek için elinden geleni yapıyorsun.{/n}
